about_the_game:
Magic Sword Girl Twins is a turn-based RPG focused on strategy and growth. Explore the world with Rose, the sister of twin sisters, to kill the 'Old One' and uncover hidden secrets.

Background Story


The Old One, a evil that eats humans and absorbs their 'Magic Power'.
Crimm and Rose, The 'Magic Sword Girls' sisters, go on the subjugation of the evil as usual.
But by an Old One that suddenly appeared, Rose falls alone down a cliff...

*The following are currently under development.

Information and Strategy


Knowing is power.
Most enemies have one weakness element.
Attack the enemy's weaknesses and lead the battle to its advantage.
On the contrary, you should be careful because some element are less affected.

Build Planning and Infinite Growth


Combine different weapon, armor, and skills to create a unique build.
Are you tired of thinking deeply? Then why don't you just increase the status a lot?
The main character 'Rose' can grow close to infinity.

Free Exploration and Progress


You don't always have to go the set route.
If you're confident in your skills, explore dangerous areas and get rarer items.
It would be very convenient if there was an item that could deceive the enemy's eyes, wouldn't it?

Multi Ending and New Game+


There are many secrets to be uncovered in this world. Find out the truth one by one through multiple endings.
After the ending, you can take over the play data and start a new game+.
There are also several contents considering NG+, such as top items and variant monsters.

Theme Dungeons and Ongoing Updates


We didn't develop Magic Sword Girl Twins as a one-time game.
We will release theme dungeon on a regular basis and continue to update the game.
Players can get special rewards for a limited time in the theme dungeon.
The sub story prepared for the theme dungeon is a bonus!

name: Magic Sword Girl Twins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: window 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU supporting OpenGL
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
